* sans - atk 1 def 1@* the most pathetic enemy.@* can only deal 1 damage.
* can't keep fighting forever.@* keep sparing.
* sans looks like he's having a @great time.
* sans feels karma flowing @through his veins.
* sans feels his sins crawling @on his back.
* sans feels his sins weighing@ on his neck.
* sans is giving up for you.
* sans is getting ready to use@  a special attack.

* sans feels his sins crawling @on his back.
* sans feels his sins weighing@ on his neck.
* you used the butterscotch pie!@* hp maxed out!
* you used the face steak!@* hp maxed out!
* you used the legendary hero!@* hp maxed out!

* you won!        @* you earned 5000 exp and 0 gold. @* your love increased.
y'know, the suface @isn't much better than @here.
heh, here you go again, @not fighting.
well, i've got news for @you% buddy.
and you tryin' to @change that, well...
honestly, i'm suprised @you've made it this far.
you convinced them @all to be better people.
well, i don't know how @you did it...
to be honest, i'm @doin' ya a favour.
if you get to asgore, @he will lock up your @soul like the others.
he will keep us all @trapped down here.
but if i get your soul, @i can cross the barrier.
i will free monsters @from here, unlike our @so-called "king".
you, uh, just keep...       @keep going, huh?
i just want to free @all monsters.
everone here may be @mean, but they are @all nice people inside.
he has kept us trapped @here for ages.
kill asgore and let @monsters return @to the surface.
guess you like doing @things the hard way, @huh?
y'know, i never thought @it would come to this.
i thought you would @do what all the humans @did.
but you just had to @not fight, huh?
we're just pointless @obstacles in your path.
in this world, it's @kill or be killed.
and i know which one @you're heading for.
kid, all this is too @tiring for me.
and belive me, you don't @want to see it.
which is why now would @be a great time to die!
i'll show you my special@ attack.
so do me proud, kid.          @do me proud.
so, the only way @to keep you here...
i'll stand here until @the end of time.
if you haven't already, @ i mean.
there is nothing left @for you here.
so the most determined @thing you can do @right now?
just give up, and @*yawn* do anything @else.
i belive you can do @the right thing.
* you won!           @* you earned 0 exp and 0 gold.
i'm here to tell you that @the events in this battle@@@@@are the creators @interpritation of undefell.
the exact events in under-@fell are not entirely @@@@@explained, leaving the au @open for interprition.
the creator is fully aware @that there is an underfell @@@@@fan game in the works, and @that it might even be finished @by the time you play this.
however, that is only a @fan game, and underfell@@@@@isn't fully defined, aside @from some little things.
so this project will most @likely be different from@@@@@the fan game.
